monster.name: Bodytaker Plant
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Podling Link
entries: The plant can see through and communicate telepathically with any of its podlings within 10 miles of it.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the plant dies, it returns to life in the place where it died {@dice 1d12} months later, unless the ground where it took root is sown with salt or soaked with poison.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The plant doesn't require sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The plant makes three Vine Lash attacks.

action.name: Vine Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The plant has four vines, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Entrapping Pod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the plant. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany d'àcid, and the target is pulled into the plant's space and enveloped by the pod, and the grapple ends. While enveloped, the target is {@condition restrained}, and it has total cover against attacks and effects originating outside the pod. The enveloped target must also immediately succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition stunned} by the plant's sapping enzymes until it is removed from the pod or the plant dies. The enveloped target doesn't require air and gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} for each hour it spends in the pod. If the target dies while enveloped, it immediately emerges from the pod as a living podling, wearing or carrying all of the original creature's equipment.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the bodytaker plant that is outside the pod can open the pod and pull the target free with a successful {@dc 15} Força check. If the plant dies, the target is no longer {@condition restrained} and can escape from the pod by spending 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}. The plant has one pod, which can envelop one creature at a time.

monster.name: Boneless
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Compression
entries: The boneless can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing. It can also squeeze to fit into a space that a Tiny creature could fit in.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The boneless doesn't require sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The boneless makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}), and the boneless can use Crushing Embrace.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Crushing Embrace
entries: The boneless wraps its body around a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. While the boneless is attached, the target is {@condition blinded} and is unable to breathe. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw at the start of each of the boneless' turns or take 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If something moves the target, the boneless moves with it. The boneless can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can use its action to try to detach the boneless and force it to move into the nearest unoccupied space, doing so with a successful {@dc 13} Força check. When the boneless dies, it detaches from any creature it is attached to.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The carrion stalker makes three Tentacle attacks. If it is attached to a creature, it can replace one Tentacle attack with Larval Burst, if available.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the carrion stalker attaches to the target and pulls itself into the target's space. While attached, the carrion stalker moves with the target and has advantage on attack rolls against it.

A creature can use its action to try to detach the carrion stalker and force it to move into the nearest unoccupied space, doing so with a successful {@dc 11} Força check. On its turn, the carrion stalker can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement. When it dies, the carrion stalker detaches from any creature it is attached to.

action.name: Larval Burst (1/Dia)
entries: The carrion stalker releases a burst of larvae in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. A creature {@condition poisoned} in this way takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí at the start of each of its turns as larvae infest its body. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Any effect that cures disease or removes the {@condition poisoned} condition instantly kills the larvae in the creature, ending the effect on it.

If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by the infestation, it dies. The larvae remain in the corpse, and one survives to become a fully grown carrion stalker in {@dice 1d4} weeks. Any effect that cures diseases or removes the {@condition poisoned} condition that targets the corpse instantly kills the larvae.

monster.name: Carrionette
languages: understands the languages of its creator

trait.name: False Object
entries: If the carrionette is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the carrionette move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa (Perception) check to discern that the carrionette is animate.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The carrionette doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Silver Needle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Carisma amb {@dc 12} o become cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet, and it must roll a {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from each ability check or attack roll it makes.

action.name: Soul Swap
entries: The carrionette targets a creature it can see within 15 feet of it that is cursed by its Silver Needle. Unless the target is protected by a protection from evil and good spell, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Carisma saving throw or have its consciousness swapped with the carrionette. The carrionette gains control of the target's body, and the target is {@condition unconscious} for 1 hour, after which it gains control of the carrionette's body. While controlling the target's body, the carrionette retains its Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores. It otherwise uses the controlled body's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

If the carrionette's body is destroyed, both the carrionette and the target die. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the controlled body drives the carrionette out and returns the consciousness of both creatures to their original bodies. The swap is also undone if the controlled body takes damage from the carrionette's Silver Needle.

trait.name: Beheaded Form
entries: When created, a death's head takes one of three forms: Aberrant Head, Gnashing Head, or Petrifying Head. This form determines the creature's attack.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The death's head doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Gnashing Bite (Gnashing Head Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Mind-Bending Bite (Aberrant Head Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Intel·ligència amb {@dc 10} o it can't take a reaction fins el final del seu proper torn. Moreover, on its next turn, the target must choose whether it gets a move, an action, or a bonus action; it gets only one of the three.

action.name: Petrifying Bite (Petrifying Head Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o be {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn to stone. The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} for 10 minutes.

monster.name: Dullahan
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Headless Summoning (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If the dullahan is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it regains 97 hit points. In addition, it summons three {@creature death's head|VRGR|death's heads}, one of each type, in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of it. The death's heads are under the dullahan's control and act immediately after the dullahan in the initiative order. Additionally, the dullahan can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section. Award a party an additional 5,900 PX (11,800 PX total) for defeating the dullahan after it uses Headless Summoning.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si the dullahan falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The dullahan doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dullahan fa dos atacs.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic. If the dullahan scores a critical hit against a creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or the dullahan cuts off the target's head. The target dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature that doesn't have or need a head, or has legendary actions, instead takes an extra 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fiery Skull
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany de foc.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The dullahan makes one attack.

legendary.name: Frightful Presence (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature of the dullahan's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the dullahan fins el final del seu proper torn.

legendary.name: Head Hunt (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The dullahan moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes one Battleaxe attack with advantage. If the attack hits, but is not a critical hit, the attack deals an extra 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany necròtic.
If the dullahan's Headless Summoning trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Coordinated Assault
entries: The dullahan makes a Battleaxe attack, and then one {@creature death's head|VRGR} the dullahan can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack.

mythic.name: Headless Wail (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: An echoing shriek issues from the dullahan's headless stump. Each creature of the dullahan's choice within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. Each creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. If one or more creatures fail the saving throw, the dullahan gains 10 temporary hit points.

monster.name: Elise

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: Elise is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever Elise is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Elise té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Elise's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Elise makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Gallows Speaker
languages: any languages its component spirits knew in life

trait.name: Divination Senses
entries: The gallows speaker can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane and vice versa.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The gallows speaker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if it ends it turn inside an object.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The gallows speaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Foretelling Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic, and the target must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of the gallows speaker's next turn.

action.name: Suffering Echoes
entries: The gallows speaker targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. Si falla, rep 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany psíquic, and waves of painful memories leap from the target to up to three other creatures of the gallows speaker's choice that are within 30 feet of the target, each of which takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (4/Dia)
entries: Si the emissary falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The emissary doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The emissary fa tres atacs.

action.name: Lashing Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Psychic Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d12 + 8}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Unearthly Bile {@recharge 5}
entries: The emissary expels bile that splashes all creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of the emissary. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany d'àcid; si supera, en rep la meitat. For each creature that fails the saving throw, a gibbering mouther (see its entry in the Monster Manual) appears in an unoccupied space on a surface that can support it within 30 feet of that creature. The gibbering mouthers act right after the emissary on the same initiative count, gaining a +7 bonus to their attack and damage rolls, and fighting until they are destroyed. They disappear when the emissary dies.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The emissary teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see and makes one attack.

legendary.name: Warp Space (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The emissary causes the ground in a 20-foot square that it can see within 90 feet of it to turn into teeth and maws until the start of its next turn. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. Any creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany perforant for each 5 feet it moves on this terrain.

legendary.name: Mind Cloud (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The emissary unleashes a psychic wave. Each creature within 30 feet of the emissary must succeed on a {@dc 23} Saviesa saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 5d12}) de dany psíquic. In addition, every spell ends on creatures and objects of the emissary's choice in that area.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força.

reaction.name: Magic Allergy (1/Dia)
entries: Immediately after a creature within 30 feet of the gremishka casts a spell, the gremishka can spontaneously react to the magic. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the effect:

entries.entry: The gremishka emanates magical energy. Each creature within 30 feet of the gremishka must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força.
The gremishka surges with magical energy and regains 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points.
The gremishka explodes and dies, and one swarm of gremishkas instantly appears in the space where this gremishka died. The swarm uses the gremishka's initiative.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, sense requerir components and using Carisma as the spellcasting ability ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur):

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword or uses Mind Fire twice.

action.name: Silver Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@dice 1d10 + 4}) if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força.

action.name: Mind Fire
entries: The inquisitor targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic and be {@condition stunned} until the start of the inquisitor's next turn.

action.name: Inquisitor's Command {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature of the inquisitor's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the inquisitor's next turn. On the {@condition charmed} target's turn, the inquisitor can telepathically control the target's move, action, or both. When controlled in this way, the target can take only the Attack (inquisitor chooses the target) or Dash action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, sense requerir components and using Saviesa as the spellcasting ability ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur):

trait.name: Metabolic Control
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the inquisitor regains 10 hit points and can end one condition on itself, provided the inquisitor has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword. After it hits or misses with an attack, the inquisitor can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Silver Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@dice 1d10 + 4}) if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força.

bonus.name: Blink Step
entries: The inquisitor teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, sense requerir components and using Intel·ligència as the spellcasting ability ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur):

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The inquisitor attacks twice.

action.name: Force Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany de força, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the inquisitor can push it up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Silver Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@dice 1d10 + 4}) if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força.

action.name: Implode {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the inquisitor can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 6d8 + 4}) de dany de força and be knocked {@condition prone} and moved to the unoccupied space closest to the sphere's center. Large and smaller objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint in the sphere automatically take the damage and are similarly moved.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Deflection
entries: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the inquisitor increases its AC by 4 against the attack. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker is hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Isolde's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Isolde pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of Isolde includes her Carisma bonus.

trait.name: Magic Resistance Aura
entries: While holding Nepenthe, Isolde creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around her. While this aura is active, Isolde and all creatures friendly to her in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Isolde makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Nepenthe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, abast 5 ft.., un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) de dany tallant, o 12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) de dany tallant if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a fiend or an undead, it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid Isolde can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys Isolde's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from Isolde or another creature or receives a suicidal command from Isolde, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Isolde's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Jiangshi
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Jiangshi Weaknesses
entries: The jiangshi has the following flaws:
{@i Fear of Its Own Reflection.} If the jiangshi sees its own reflection, it immediately uses its reaction, if available, to move as far away from the reflection as possible.
{@i Susceptible to Holy Symbols.} While the jiangshi is wearing or touching a holy symbol, it automatically fails saving throws against effects that turn Undead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The jiangshi doesn't require air.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The jiangshi makes three Slam attacks and uses Consume Energy.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Consume Energy
entries: The jiangshi draws energy from a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target makes a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat. The jiangshi regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. After regaining hit points from this action, the jiangshi gains the following benefits for 7 days: its walking speed increases to 40 feet, and it gains a flying speed equal to its walking speed and can hover.

A Humanoid slain by this necrotic damage rises as a wight (see its entry in the Monster Manual) at the end of the jiangshi's turn. The wight acts immediately after the jiangshi in the initiative order. If this wight slays a Humanoid with its Drenar Vida, the wight transforms into a jiangshi 5 days later.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The jiangshi polymorphs into a Beast, a Humanoid, or an Undead that is Medium or Small or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the jiangshi's choice). It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Aberrant Rejuvenation
entries: When the emissary drops to 0 hit points, its body melts away. A greater star spawn emissary instantly appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where the lesser emissary disappeared. The greater emissary uses the lesser emissary's initiative count.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the emissary falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The emissary doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The emissary fa tres atacs.

action.name: Lashing Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Psychic Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The emissary polymorphs into a Small or Medium creature of its choice or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

legendary.name: Psychic Orb
entries: The emissary makes a Psychic Orb attack.

legendary.name: Teleportation Maw (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The emissary teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it and can make a Lashing Maw attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Lash (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The emissary targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and psychically lashes at that creature's mind. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Saviesa saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany psíquic and be {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

walk.condition: (40 ft. in hybrid form, 50 ft. in dire wolf form)

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The loup garou has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: When the loup garou fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The loup garou regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the loup garou takes damage from a silver weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the loup garou's next turn. The loup garou dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The loup garou fa dos atacs: two with its Longsword (humanoid form) or one with its Bite and one with its Claws (dire wolf or hybrid form).

action.name: Bite (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw or be cursed with loup garou lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Longsword (Només en Forma Humanoide)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

bonus.name: Change Shape
entries: The loup garou polymorphs into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a Large dire wolf, or back into its true form, which appears humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

legendary.name: Swipe
entries: The loup garou makes one Claws attack (dire wolf or hybrid form only) or one Longsword attack (només en forma humanoide).

legendary.name: Mauling Pounce (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The loup garou moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks, and it can make one Claws attack (dire wolf or hybrid form only) or one Longsword attack (només en forma humanoide) against each creature it moves past.

legendary.name: Bite (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The loup garou changes into hybrid or dire wolf form and then makes one Bite attack.

monster.name: Necrichor
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si the necrichor falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Unless its lifeless remains are splashed with holy water or placed in a vessel under the effects of the hallow spell, the destroyed necrichor re-forms in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hits points and appearing in the place it died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The necrichor pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The necrichor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The necrichor fa dos atacs.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 14} o be {@condition paralyzed} until the start of the necrichor's next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the necrichor's next turn.

action.name: Blood Puppeteering {@recharge}
entries: The necrichor targets a creature it can see within 5 feet of it that is missing any of its hit points. If the target isn't a Construct or an Undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or the necrichor enters the target's space and attaches itself to the target for 1 minute. While attached, the necrichor takes only half damage dealt to it (round down), and the target takes the remaining damage. The necrichor can attach to only one creature at a time.

The attached necrichor can telepathically control the target's move, action, or both. When controlled this way, the target can take only the Attack action (necrichor chooses the target) or the Dash action. The attached target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, detaching from the necrichor and forcing it to move into the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

monster.name: Nosferatu
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The nosferatu pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The nosferatu doesn't require air.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nosferatu makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic.

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the nosferatu regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises as a nosferatu after {@dice 1d10} days.

action.name: Blood Disgorge {@recharge 5}
entries: The nosferatu vomits blood en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

monster.name: Podling
languages: the languages the creature knew in life

trait.name: Semblance of Life
entries: The podling is a physical copy of a creature digested by a bodytaker plant. The podling has the digested creature's memories and behaves like that creature, but with occasional lapses. An observer familiar with the digested creature can recognize the discrepancies with a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Insight) check, or automatically if the podling does something in direct contradiction to the digested creature's established beliefs or behavior. The podling melts into a slurry when it dies, when the bodytaker plant that created it dies, or when the bodytaker plant dismisses it (no action required).

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The podling doesn't require sleep.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Tattoo of Osybus
entries: If the priest drops to 0 hit points, roll on the Boons of Undeath table for the boon the priest receives. The priest dies if it receives a boon it already has. If it receives a new boon, it revives at the start of its next turn with half its hit points restored, and its creature type is now Undead.

To prevent this revival, the Tattoo of Osybus on the priest's body must be destroyed. The tattoo is invulnerable while the priest has at least 1 hit point. The tattoo is otherwise an object with AC 15, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage. It has 15 hit points, but it regains all its hit points at the end of every combatant's turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The priest attacks twice.

action.name: Soul Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition paralyzed} until the start of the priest's next turn. If this damage reduces a Medium or smaller creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies, and its soul is trapped in the priest's body, manifesting as a shadowy Soul Tattoo on the priest. The soul is freed if the priest dies.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the priest's next turn.

bonus.name: Soul Tattoo {@recharge 5}
entries: The priest touches one of the Soul Tattoos on its body. The tattoo vanishes as the trapped soul manifests as a shadowy creature that appears in an unoccupied space the priest can see within 30 feet of it. The creature has the size and silhouette of its original body, but it otherwise uses the stat block of a shadow.

The shadow obeys the priest's mental commands (no action required) and takes its turn immediately after the priest. If the creature is within 5 feet of the priest, it can turn back into a tattoo as an action, reappearing on the priest's flesh and regaining all its hit points.

variant.name: Boons of Undeath
entries: When a priest of Osybus drops to 0 hit points, the priest might revive with a benefit from the Boons of Undeath table. You can give a priest one or more of these boons of your choice before the priest faces adventurers. If you do so, the priest is Undead, rather than Humanoid, and a priest can receive each boon only once.

rows.name: Dread
entries: Eerie whispers can now be heard around the priest. Any non-Undead creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the priest must succeed on a DC 15 Saviesa saving throw or be frightened of the priest until the start of the creature's next turn.

rows.name: Ectoplasmic
entries: An otherworldly slime drips off the priest and fades away moments later, leaving a greenish stain. When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the priest, the priest can reduce that creature's speed by 10 feet until the start of the creature's next turn, until which the creature is covered by ectoplasm. In addition, as an action, the priest can use the slime to make itself look and feel like any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics. This transformation lasts for 8 hours or until the priest drops to 0 hit points.

rows.name: Vampiric
entries: When the priest deals necrotic damage to any creature, the priest gains a number of temporary hit points equal to half that necrotic damage. The priest's speed also increases by 10 feet.

rows.name: Blazing
entries: The priest sloughs off its flesh, and its skeleton crumbles away, leaving only its skull. Its stat block is replaced by that of a flameskull, but it retains its Tattoo of Osybus trait, and all fire damage it deals becomes necrotic damage. The Tattoo of Osybus now appears carved into the skull's forehead.

rows.name: Spectral
entries: The priest now appears wraithlike, and its challenge rating increases by 1. It gains resistance to all damage but force, radiant, and psychic, and it is vulnerable to radiant damage. It can also move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de força if it ends its turn inside a creature or an object.

rows.name: Deathly
entries: The priest's visage becomes bone white, and its challenge rating increases by 1. It can cast animate dead and create undead once per day each, using Intel·ligència as the spellcasting ability, and it gains the following action:

entries.name: Circle of Death (Spell; {@recharge 5|m})
entries: Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the priest can see within 150 feet of it must make a DC 15 Constitució saving throw, taking 28 ({@dice 8d6}) de dany necròtic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.)

monster.name: Implacable Juggernaut
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the juggernaut falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The juggernaut regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the juggernaut takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The juggernaut dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The juggernaut doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The juggernaut fa dos atacs. It can replace one attack with Deadly Shaping if it is ready.

action.name: Executioner's Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant, and if the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the juggernaut's next turn.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Deadly Shaping {@recharge 5}
entries: The juggernaut magically shapes a feature of its surroundings into a deadly implement. A creature the juggernaut can see within 60 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. If the saving throw fails, the targeted creature is struck by one of the following (juggernaut's choice):

action.name: Flying Stone
entries: The target takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany contundent and is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of the juggernaut's next turn, and the implement vanishes.

action.name: Scything Shrapnel
entries: The target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany tallant, and the implement vanishes. At the start of each of its turns, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic from the wound left by the shrapnel. The wound ends if the target regains any hit points or if a creature uses an action to stanch the wound, which requires a successful {@dc 15} Saviesa (Medicine) check.

legendary.name: Implacable Advance
entries: The juggernaut moves up to its speed, ignoring difficult terrain. Any object in its path takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany contundent if it isn't being worn or carried.

legendary.name: Rapid Shaping (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The juggernaut recharges Deadly Shaping and uses it.

monster.name: Implacable Slasher
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: Si the slasher falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Shrouded Presence
entries: The slasher is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, and it can't be detected by abilities that sense Fiends.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slasher makes two Slasher's Knife attacks.

action.name: Slasher's Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, it suffers a lingering wound that causes it to take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic at the start of each of its turns. Each time the slasher hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}). The wound ends if the target regains hit points or if a creature uses an action to stanch the wound, which requires a successful {@dc 15} Saviesa (Medicine) check.

legendary.name: Slice
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Vanishing Strike (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The slasher makes one Slasher's Knife attack. After the attack hits or misses, the slasher can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Stirge Telepathy
entries: The strigoi can magically command any stirge within 120 feet of it, using a limited form of telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The strigoi makes one Claw attack and makes one Proboscis attack.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic, and the strigoi regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and leaves nothing behind except its skin and its equipment.

action.name: Ravenous Children (1/Dia)
entries: The strigoi magically summons {@dice 1d4 + 2} stirges (see their entry in the Monster Manual) in unoccupied spaces it can see within 30 feet of it. The stirges are under the strigoi's control and act immediately after the strigoi in the initiative order. The stirges disappear after 1 hour, when the strigoi dies, or when the strigoi dismisses them (no action required).

trait.name: Limited Spell Immunity
entries: The swarm automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 3rd level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny gremishka. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força.

reaction.name: Spell Redirection
entries: In response to a spell attack roll missing the swarm, the swarm causes that spell a impactar another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it that it can see.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Infestation
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or contract a disease.
Each time the diseased creature finishes a long rest, roll a {@dice d6} to determine the disease's effect:
The creature is {@condition blinded} until it finishes a long rest.
The creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 ({@dice 2d4}), and the reduction can't be removed until the disease ends. The creature dies if its hit point maximum drops to 0.
The creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until it finishes its next long rest.
The disease lasts until it's removed by magic or until the creature rolls the same random effect for the disease two long rests in a row.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Skeletonize
entries: If the swarm starts its turn in the same space as a dead creature that is Large or smaller, the corpse is destroyed, leaving behind only equipment and bones (or exoskeleton).

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The swarm pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Ravenous Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, scarabs burrow into its body, and the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant at the start of each of its turns. Any creature can use an action to kill or remove the scarabs with fire or a weapon that deals piercing damage, causing 1 damage of the appropriate type to the target. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the swarm's piercing damage dies.

monster.name: Swarm of Zombie Limbs
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny limb. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The swarm makes one Undead Mass attack and one Grasping Limbs attack.

action.name: Undead Mass
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Grasping Limbs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Força saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic on a failed save. The creature is freed if it succeeds on this saving throw, the swarm moves out of the creature's space, or the swarm dies.

items.name: Grappler
entries: The Bagman has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

items.name: Amorphous
entries: The Bagman can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

items.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read the Bagman's thoughts, that creature must succeed on a DC {@dc 8} Intel·ligència saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition stunned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Formed by the Mists
entries: When created, the horror's body composition takes one of four forms: Aberrant Armor, Loathsome Limbs, Malleable Mass, or Oozing Organs. This form determines certain traits in this stat block.

trait.name: Amorphous (Malleable Mass Only)
entries: The horror can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Bile Body (Oozing Organs Only)
entries: Any creature that touches the horror or hits it with a melee attack takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: Implacable Stride (Loathsome Limbs Only)
entries: The horror can move through the space of another creature. The first time on a turn that the horror enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The horror makes two Limbs attacks.

action.name: Limbs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hex Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror expels necrotic energy en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 7d12}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Customizing a Horror
entries: An unspeakable horror has one of four body compositions, determined by rolling on the Body Composition table. You can roll on the Limbs to customize it further, while results from the Hex Blast table replace that action in the stat block. If the results of multiple tables conflict, chose your preferred result.

The results of these tables are meant to be broad, so feel free to describe the details of an unspeakable horror's form and the interplay between its parts however you desire. The more discordant and unexpected a horror's parts, the more unsettling it might be.

rows.name: Aberrant Armor
entries: The horror's body is armored in petrified wood, alien crystal, rusted mechanisms, sculpted stone, or an exoskeleton.

rows.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: The horror's body boasts spider like legs, many-jointed appendages, or thrashing tentacles.

rows.name: Malleable Mass
entries: The horror's body is composed of a clot of boneless flesh, shadowy tendrils, or mist.

rows.name: Oozing Organs
entries: The horror's body boasts exposed entrails, bloated parasites, or a gelatinous shroud, perhaps because it is inside out.

rows.name: Beguiling Hex {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror expels a wave of mind-altering magic. Each creature within 30 feet of the horror must make a DC 15 Saviesa saving throw, taking 33 ({@dice 6d10}) de dany psíquic and being incapacitated until the end of the creature's next turn on a failed save, or taking half as much damage on a successful one.

rows.name: Bile Hex {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror expels acidic bile in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 15 Destresa saving throw or be covered in bile. A creature covered in bile takes 31 ({@dice 7d8}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of its turns until it or another creature uses its action to scrape or wash off the bile that covers it.

rows.name: Petrifying Hex {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror expels petrifying gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a DC 15 Constitució saving throw or take 14 ({@dice 4d6}) de dany necròtic and be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. A restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

rows.name: Reality-Stealing Hex {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror expels a wave of perception-distorting energy. Each creature within 30 feet of the horror must make a DC 15 Saviesa saving throw. Si falla, rep 22 ({@dice 5d8}) de dany psíquic and is deafened fins el final del seu proper torn. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also blinded fins el final del seu proper torn.

rows.name: Bone Blade
entries: The horror's limb ends in a blade made of bone, which deals slashing damage instead of dany contundent. In addition, it scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice of a crit three times, instead of twice.

rows.name: Corrosive Pseudòpode
entries: The horror's limb attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) de dany d'àcid.

rows.name: Grasping Tentacle
entries: The horror's limb is a grasping tentacle. When the horror hits a creature with this limb, the creature is also grappled (CD 16 per escapar). The limb can have only one creature grappled at a time.

rows.name: Poisonous Limb
entries: The horror's limb deals piercing damage instead of dany contundent. In addition, when the horror hits a creature with this limb, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitució saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany de verí and be poisoned fins el final del seu proper torn.

monster.name: Vampiric Mind Flayer
languages: telepatía 120 peus but can only project emotions

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The mind flayer pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the mind flayer has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Saviesa (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The mind flayer doesn't require air, food, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mind flayer makes two Claw attacks or one Claw attack and one Tentacles attack.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Drink Sapience
entries: The mind flayer targets one creature it is grappling. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany psíquic and gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. The mind flayer regains a number of hit points equal to the psychic damage dealt. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the psychic damage dies.

bonus.name: Disrupt Psyche (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psionic energy in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition incapacitated} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Zombie Clot
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Deathly Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Flesh Entomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The zombie flings a detached clump of corpses at a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Força saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it becomes entombed in dead flesh.

A creature entombed in the dead flesh is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the dead flesh, and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic at the start of each of its turns. The creature can be freed if the dead flesh is destroyed. The dead flesh is a Large object with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

monster.name: Zombie Plague Spreader
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Viral Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the plague spreader ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} and can't regain hit points fins el final del seu proper torn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this plague spreader's Viral Aura for 24 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The plague spreader makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Virulent Miasma (1/Dia)
entries: The plague spreader releases toxic gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises as a zombie (see its stat block in the Monster Manual) 1 minute later. The zombie acts immediately after the plague spreader in the initiative count.
